The category of the content that is contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值通常是做為應用程式的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]建立瀏覽控制項的標籤。The value is typically used as part of the application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] to create labels for navigation controls.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定值，表示 的狀態。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the status of the .
The status of the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 範例值包括 [草稿]、 「 已檢閱 」 和 「 最後 」。Example values include "Draft", "Reviewed", and "Final".

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the type of content that is contained in the .
The type of content that is contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 範例值包括 「 白皮書 」、 「 資訊安全佈告欄"和"測驗 」。Example values include "Whitepaper", "Security Bulletin", and "Exam". 這屬性是不同於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)]內容類型，如 RFC 2616 中所定義。This property is distinct from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] content types as defined in RFC 2616.

A description of the content contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能包括但不限於： 抽象的資料表的內容，內容的圖形表示法或任意文字帳戶內容的參考。The may include but is not limited to: an abstract, table of contents, reference to a graphical representation of content, or a free-text account of the content.

summary.span: 釋放 執行個體使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 執行個體使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 執行個體所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
